sentence.Network_en: Fruits ellipsoidal, 1.2 - 1.8 cm long, tomentose, main ridge with corky wing.
sentence.Network_cn: 果椭圆状球形, 长1.2-1.8厘米,被长绒毛, 主棱具木栓质翅.

sentence.Network_en: Inflorescence paniculate, rachis tawny tomentose; female flowers borne on basal part of the inflorescence.
sentence.Network_cn: 花序圆锥状; 花序轴被灰黄色短绵毛; 雌花著生于花序轴下部.

sentence.Network_en: Young shoots, petioles, abaxial surface of leaves, inflorescence, calyces and pods densely tomentose.
sentence.Network_cn: 嫩枝 、 叶柄 、 叶背 、 花序 、 花萼和荚果密被毡毛.

list.abs: Branchlets and buds densely tomentose or pubescent ., 小枝和芽密被绒毛或短柔毛.
